body:
After marking `cray-pmi` as external:

```yaml
packages:
  cray-pmi:
    externals:
    - spec: cray-pmi@5.0.17
      prefix: /opt/cray/pe/pmi/5.0.17
```

You can now install

```
spack install something ^mpich pmi=cray
```

and

```console
srun $(spack location -i something)/bin/your_app
```
title: mpich: add pmi=cray support
